tacos.name: Ensalada De La Casa
tacos.description: Crisp romain and iceberg lettuce, cotija cheese, slice tomatoes, fresh cucumbers, red onions and our delicious pineapple with salsa verde dressing

tacos.name: Taco Salad
tacos.description: Crispy flour tortilla filled with spinach and romaine lettuce, pinto beans, mozzarella cheese, pico de gallo, sour cream and avocade slices
